subject: Olympic Games
Television
lead_paragraph: ESPN, Fox and the other main contenders for United States television rights to the Olympics have shown interest in buying a package covering four Games rather than the usual two-Games deal, the I.O.C.’s chief negotiator said.
snippet: ESPN, Fox and the other main contenders for United States television rights to the Olympics have shown interest in buying a package covering four Games rather than the usual two-Games deal, the I.O.C.’s chief negotiator said.
